about_the_game:
Quantum is a very common space mineral that was discovered in the MEGA universe, where they use this mineral as fuel for spaceships. Something is happening with the Quantum mines that are beginning to disappear, you have been recruited like many other explorers to solve this mystery.



Stel is a space action-adventure game with procedurally generated elements. Explore the different planets finding increasingly deadly enemies, find and buy items to upgrade your ship and solve the mystery of the universe, Quantum mines are disappearing.

Features Demo

  • 2 playable ships
  • More than 10 totally different enemies
  • Over 30 combinable items
  • Integrated control support for controllers
  • Multiple save files


For more details on the game follow us on twitter @mekmekdev or enter to Discord server

Music produced by Pablo Gillet, Instagram: @wavpablo

name: Stel Demo
short_description: Stel is a spaceship action-adventure game with procedurally generated elements. Fight dangerous foes, improve your ship and explore the different levels to decipher a mysterious problem, the Quantum are disappearing...
